snippet.title: Pry Into The Void - Monster Taming Direct 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Pry Into The Void is a dark, monster-taming RPG where players explore a dying world filled with moral dilemmas and soul-searching encounters. In this first entry of Project: Retched Garden, players take on the role of Josef, a young man thrust into the Void to confront a sinister force draining the world of its life force.

Armed with the unique ability to peer into the hearts of monsters, Josef must recruit these creatures by engaging them in deep, soulful conversations. The game challenges players to navigate complex moral choices while exploiting enemy weaknesses in strategic, turn-based combat, ultimately building a team of allies to aid in the perilous journey.

With its branching narrative and emphasis on personal morality, Pry Into The Void offers a thought-provoking experience that resonates with both in-game characters and players themselves.

Wishlist Now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1234990/Pry_Into_The_Void/

https://twitter.com/RetchedGarden

https://dangenentertainment.com/
https://twitter.com/Dangen_Ent

#PryIntoTheVoid #monstertaming #monstertamer #indiegame
